text: Julia Rayner is a British actress, who has appeared in The Pianist (2002), Topsy-Turvy (1999) and The Gift (1998). ==Films== *The Gift (1998) *Topsy- Turvy (1999) *The Pianist as Regina Szpilman ==References== Category:Living people Category:20th-century British actresses Category:21st-century British actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Julia Rayner
